name: Visionet GenAI Studio
description: Visionet GenAI Studio is a unified enterprise GenAI platform with Platform Accelerator for one-click deployment, Application Accelerator for low-code/no-code development, and Solution Marketplace with 50+ pre-built solutions across industries, productivity, and engineering domains.

services.name: GenAI Platform Accelerator
services.description: Enterprise blueprint for GenAI platform with integrated tools & technology. One-click deployment across cloud providers with Model Switchboard for LLM access across hyperscalers. AD Integrated with guardrails, LLMOPS, visibility, analytics & reporting.

services.name: GenAI Application Accelerator
services.description: Low code/No code based GenAI app development. Build custom RAG apps, chatbots, and AI agents with integrated workflow automation. Playground to test applications and publish to multiple channels.

services.name: GenAI Solution Marketplace
services.description: Solution Jumpstart with 50+ pre-built solutions including Industry Solutions, Productivity Solutions, and Engineering Solutions. Re-usable agents & prompts.

services.name: LLM Orchestration
services.description: Advanced RAG (single and multi-agent), prompts engineering, chaining, routing, and memory management with LLM cache, logging, and validation.

services.name: Data Processing & Embeddings
services.description: Data transformation, augmentation, pipelines and storage with support for databases, vector databases, SharePoint, Salesforce, and object storage.

services.name: Responsible AI Framework
services.description: Guardrails for input/output validation, PII detection, bias detection, fairness, robustness, truthfulness, and safety with privacy preservation.

productivity_solutions: Employee assistance (Ask RMG, Ask HR, Ask Finance)
IDP - Chat with PDF, Q&A, entity extraction
